channel.title: I have a few simple questions
channel.description: How do I change max stat in my server? How do I change the emote names? in emotes like "yes think" ect.

item.title: I have a few simple questions
item.dc:creator: @_O_Wowzers :O Wowzers!
item.description:
@_O_Wowzers wrote:

got this off a tutorial some1 made cant remember who
search for something in ur emote tab in client.java lik @blu@home
now the id’s that say home and all that other crap r like this

180);= case 168: 181);= case 169: 185);=case 170: 186);=case 171: 187);=case 172: 177);=case 165: 179);=case 167: 176);=case 166: 182);=case 161: 175);=case 164: 173);=case 163: 178);=case 162:
like if uwant to change 180 search case 168 and put in whatever command or thing u want

Read full topic
item.source: I have a few simple questions

item.title: I have a few simple questions

item.description:
@Patrickftw wrote:

That guy is annoying in leetspeak…lol…Well for emotes to change the name go to the TextHandler I’m pretty sure, I can’t quite remember. But look at the text handler.
